Entries.default:
"I hope we haven't spent too much time in the baths?" 

A young woman takes your measure wearing a concerned frown.
"What brings you to the bathhouse?"
"Enjoy the bath."

"I am helping Hurwyna to conceive. She came all the way from the Dyrwood and I will see that she returns with arms laden with young." 

Seinu grins her way.
"After the Hollowborn crisis, I wanted no child of mine born in those blighted lands."

"This place is a miracle. Every day I emerge from the baths as a new woman, and my first child will be as strong as an adra pillar." 

She looks to Seinu with a bright smile.
"Good luck with that."
"It's fine, I don't work here."
[Lie] "Time's up."
[Say nothing.]
"I see. My thanks for clearing that up."

"In any case, we hope you enjoy your time."

Her companion subtly tips her head to shoo you away.
"Oh... but it feels as if we just arrived." She raises a hand to her lips and glances to her companion.
"Hail again, fellow bather." Hurwyna smiles and splashes a palmful of water in your direction.

"I've already spoken to the steward. We're not to be disturbed."

She crosses her arms and stares you down.
"There's room enough for us all." She turns to her companion.
"I don't think that's a guaranteed result."
"That will never work."
"My thanks! And luck to you on your stay here." She smiles. Her companion simply nods.
"Is that... true?" She blinks at Seinu.
"Do not listen. Luminous adra is the life of the Deadfire. It can bring life to you, I say." She rests her palm on Hurwyna's shoulder and dismisses you with a look.
